bio:
Michael Ciccarelli is a creative developer merging design and technology to build web apps and digital products. specializing in motion design, intuitive UX, and headless architecture, he delivers engaging, business-ready solutions.

Based in Brooklyn, NY, he founded kolumn, a technology studio building consumer apps, B2B SaaS and emerging tech solutions in blockchain, crypto and DeFi.

projects.title: The Bar
projects.description: Portfolio site for Amazon/XCM. Next.js, Sanity, Tailwind CSS & Framer Motion.
